title: The Righteous
description: Devlin: warrior, mercenary... vampire.Justine: human, courtesan... slayer.Sent to Paris by the High King of the Vampires, Devlin is not prepared to fall in love with the very woman he was hired to kill.This short story is a prequel to the Cin Craven series, first published in The Mammoth Book of Vampire Romance.
author: Jenna Maclaine
